summary: This document is an email from Landon Thomas, a financial correspondent for the New York Times, reaching out to Jeffrey Epstein's associate for background information on Epstein's views regarding market recovery. Thomas intends to quote Epstein in a story about market efficiency and overseas sales despite a gloomy job outlook.

persons.name: Landon Thomas
persons.context: Landon Thomas is reaching out to an associate of Jeffrey Epstein for background information on Epstein's market views for a story he is writing.

persons.name: Jeffrey Epstein
persons.context: Jeffrey Epstein is mentioned as having a particular view on the markets that Landon Thomas intends to quote in his article.

connections.description: Landon Thomas is a journalist who is seeking to quote Jeffrey Epstein regarding his views on the markets.

keyFacts: Landon Thomas is writing a story about market recovery and efficiency.
Jeffrey Epstein has a specific viewpoint on the markets that Thomas intends to quote.
The email was sent on Labor Day, indicating the urgency of the request for background information.
